interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs
Review Date: 2021/01/04
Store: Rancco
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was excited for the petal balls but they left me wanting more.  They arrived in a brown bag and were smaller than I anticipated -about 1" around.  All the petal balls are in color foil.  The smell isn't the best and they aren't labeled so I was unsure what flower ball I was using.  These could really be a wow in a bathroom or add to your bath time enjoyment if they were larger, had a better smell and you could tell which petal ball you were using.
Review Title: Could be better
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen BRUNETTE AIKIMUSE {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.58 x 4 x 0.75 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This product started off promising but after one eye the color stopped coming out. Also the delineation between the four prongs blended into one.
It could have been better but sadly it's not working. Started off good but QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day, Waterproof, Smudge Proof Eyelashes Joruby {'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Waterproof', 'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I'm always looking for a good mascara that will make my lashes appear thicker and longer. I thought this product worked well. Some other fiber mascara 's have various steps to achieve this while this is a one step process. I do find d the fiber mascara to be thicker and sticker than traditional mascara 's.
Although this does have a faint odor it worked well Good but a little smelly Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz WELLUTION {'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'} I’m outside a lot in the summer and my hair sees a lot of sun and chlorine from the pool. It’s also becoming lighter with more grey. I was excited about trying this. I’ve used it for a few days and adult didn’t notice a huge change in the tone. It does feel somewhat softer though
I’m also not a fan of the packaging. There isn’t a pump or squeeze bottle. You just stick your hand in the jar. Not a change in tone PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top SIGHTLING {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'} I really liked the look and feel of this foundation. It went on easily for a full coverage smooth look. I usually use a sponge when applying foundation but I really liked the easy of the brush. The only downside is that neither color worked. Great coverage LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Serum 55mL, Blemish care, soothing care, for brighten & luminous skin LAPOTHICELL {'Product Dimensions': '1.65 x 1.65 x 4.13 inches; 3.77 Ounces'} I've been using this for about a week a cm I know it usually takes about 21 days to see a change but I'm hopeful that the positive results will continue. I have sun damage spots and I'm hoping to diminish them for a more even skin tone. This product is easy to use. You use the dropper and spread the product on you face. I like to use at night after washing my face but I suppose you can use it in the morning if you prefer. It does go on a little sticky but it dries quickly. Refreshing LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set LUXAZA {'Brand': 'LUXAZA', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream Eyeshadow', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 5 x 0.87 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} These are fun and easy to use. I like that color easily apply the color I want quickly. The colors aren't my cuppa but I can work with them. I was able to blend with a more neutral shade to get the perfect look that I wanted. A good eyeshadow pencil Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Rancco {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} I was excited for the petal balls but they left me wanting more. They arrived in a brown bag and were smaller than I anticipated -about 1" around. All the petal balls are in color foil. The smell isn't the best and they aren't labeled so I was unsure what flower ball I was using. These could really be a wow in a bathroom or add to your bath time enjoyment if they were larger, had a better smell and you could tell which petal ball you were using. Could be better
profile:
**User Summary:**

The user's beauty product preferences continue to evolve, with an increasing focus on skincare aimed at enhancing skin luminosity and combating sun damage spots, reflecting a commitment to achieving an even skin tone. Their interest in eyebrow enhancement products for a natural finish persists, as does their preference for volumizing and lengthening mascaras that are easy to apply. They maintain a steady exploration of hair care for color-treated hair and favor foundations that provide full coverage and a smooth finish.

Quality expectations are high, with the user valuing reliability and effectiveness, often providing constructive feedback on products. Recently, they expressed a willingness to explore diverse product categories, evidenced by their purchase of fragrant tea balls, despite finding them underwhelming in size and scent. This openness to new experiences highlights their adaptability and creativity, as they seek products that enhance convenience within their beauty routine.

The user’s rating trends reveal a discerning approach; they offer mixed ratings when expectations are unmet but are apt to reward satisfying products with higher scores. Overall, their preferences emphasize a holistic approach to beauty and wellness, prioritizing effective, functional products across skincare, makeup, and personal care categories, while maintaining a dedication to thorough and balanced feedback.
